subtitleNullable: russian news article corpus for paraphrase generation
descriptionNullable:
### Context

We came up with this dataset at ITMO University while researching a better algorithm for paraphrase generation.
This dataset was collected from various news agencies.

We started with [corpus of news titles](http://paraphraser.ru/download/get?file\_id=1), which was labeled by humans and has 3 types of labels: definitely paraphrases, possible paraphrases, not paraphrases.

After that, we used our crawlers to download full original articles, connected to the aforementioned titles.
In order to download the data, we implemented a crawler for each of the following Russian news agencies: [RBC](\url{https://www.rbc.ru/), 
[RIA Novosti](https://ria.ru/), 
[Lenta.ru](https://lenta.ru/), 
[Rossiyskaya Gazeta](https://rg.ru/), 
[INOSmi](https://inosmi.ru/), 
[Kommersant](https://www.kommersant.ru/).

After downloading, we performed some preprocessing steps on each article: splitting into paragraphs, removing stop-words, lemmatisation, additional copy with stemming performed on it. 

### Content

This XML document contains pro-processed Russian news articles.

Exact format TBD.

### Acknowledgements

[Kirill Vakhrushev](https://github.com/krikyn/)
Valeria Efimova
AndreyFilchenkov
Viacheslav Shalamov

### Inspiration

We hope it helps when solving paraphrase generation task.
